Package entityControllers

Class WorkerEntityController

java.lang.Object
entityControllers.WorkerEntityController
public class WorkerEntityController extends Object
This class is responsible for storing and managing a User object for worker and the worker second role. It also provides various methods to check the user's existence, and worker second role.
